reset_message: Please enter your email address so we can send you an email to reset your password.
message_no_posts: You have not published any posts yet.
message_post_hidden: This post has been hidden by administrator !
message_no_posts_user: {{username}} has not published any posts yet.
message_welcome: Activate your account to gain access to WaveUp app. Open the message, click an activation link and verify your email.
home_meet: With WaveUp, meeting up has never been easier. Our platform provides a vibrant and inclusive space where you can effortlessly connect with friends, old and new. Join the WaveUp community today and unlock a world of opportunities.
home_talk: Engage in lively discussions on a wide range of topics, share your thoughts and experiences. From hobbies and passions to current events and trending subjects, WaveUp provides a platform where diverse perspectives thrive.
home_memories: Expand your network, explore new horizons, and create memories that will last a lifetime. Share your adventures, milestones, and everyday joys with your friends, family, and the wider WaveUp community. Discover the stories behind other people's photos and leave meaningful feedback.
footer_rights: Copyright Â© 2023 by WaveUp Inc. All rights reserved.
